title: CNN News18 ने मलेशिया द्वारा ज़ाकिर नाइक के प्रत्यर्पण के बारे में असत्यापित दावा किया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: #BREAKING – Malaysia refuses asylum to Zakir Naik, asks him to leave the country after @narendramodi government provided evidence against him. UAE and Saudi Arabia have also refused asylum to Zakir. | Input: @manojkumargupta. pic.twitter.com/AvOvkg7Qmu
